title: Krupos 2 Professional v6.2.0.3
description:
Krupos 2 Professional v6.2.0.3


Encrypt your files, Secure your computer

Lock and encrypt all your sensitive files and folders including your photos, movies, credit card data, tax returns or any other private document.	

Your files are encrypted with the world's strongest technology.
256 bit Encryption
Kruptos 2 uses military graded, 256bit AES encryption to secure your data
Prevents data theft
Your files are locked even if your computer or phone is stolen or broken into.
Encrypt any file
Encrypt your folders and files including your PDF, Word and Excel documents...


Easy and secure encryption for the cloud
Encrypt your Dropbox, Dropbox for Businesss, Microsoft OneDrive or Google Drive files with fully integrated and seamless Cloud encryption and data shredding.
Seamless integration
Your cloud files are automatically and seamlessly integrated into your Kruptos 2 library ready for encryption
Simple and easy to use
Encrypt and secure your cloud files in as little as one click!
Works with...
Dropbox, Google Drive, Microsoft OneDrive and Dropbox for business


Create Secure private notes
Create, organise, and keep your important personal notes safe and secure with our inbuilt secure note editor.
Store top-secret keys, wifi passwords, bank details...whatever you like. Keep them safe, private, and accessible to only you.
256 bit Encryption
Your notes are encrypted with military graded, 256bit AES encryption
Share your notes
Automatically share your notes between any computer with seamless cloud integration
Easy to use
Easily create your secure notes with our fully integrated editor
 
Official Website: http://www.kruptos2.co.uk/
